languages.text: Тайное правление Муарана принесло свои отравленные плоды. Неоднократно в агрокомплексах вспыхивали восстания — серфы чувствовали, что ими манипулирует враждебная Человечеству сила. Лишенные сочувствия к людям, эльдары разработали систему контроля и устранения непокорных, верша террор в ночи. Янус согнулся под ярмом нелюдской оккупации.

Muaran's secret rule bore poisonous fruit. Repeated rebellions broke out in the agri-complexes as the serfs felt they were being manipulated by a force hostile to Humanity. Devoid of sympathy for humans, the Aeldari developed a plan to control and eliminate the unruly, terrorising them in the night. Janus bent under the yoke of inhuman occupation.
languages.original_text: Тайное правление Муарана принесло свои отравленные плоды. Неоднократно в агрокомплексах вспыхивали восстания — серфы чувствовали, что ими манипулирует враждебная Человечеству сила. Лишенные сочувствия к людям, эльдары разработали систему контроля и устранения непокорных, верша террор в ночи. Янус согнулся под ярмом нелюдской оккупации.

Devoid of sympathy for humans, the Aeldari developed a plan to control and eliminate the unruly, terrorising them in the night. Janus bent under the yoke of inhuman occupation.

Muaran's secret rule bore poisonous fruit. Repeated rebellions broke out in the agri-complexes as the serfs felt they were being manipulated by a force hostile to Humanity. Devoid of sympathy for humans, the Aeldari developed a plan to control and eliminate the unruly, terrorising them in the night. Janus bent under the yoke of inhuman occupation.

languages.text: 穆兰的幕后统治带来了恶果。农奴们发现自己被某种与人类敌对的力量操纵，于是在综合农业中心里不断爆发叛乱。由于艾达灵族对人类毫无同情之心，他们制定了计划，消灭、控制那些不守规矩的人，在夜间恐吓他们。到了最后，加努斯的农奴在异形的压迫之下屈服了。
languages.original_text: Muaran's secret rule bore poisonous fruit. Repeated rebellions broke out in the agri-complexes as the serfs felt they were being manipulated by a force hostile to Humanity. Devoid of sympathy for humans, the Aeldari developed a plan to control and eliminate the unruly, terrorising them in the night. Janus bent under the yoke of inhuman occupation.

traits.locale_text: 穆兰的幕后统治带来了恶果。农奴们发现自己被某种与人类敌对的力量操纵，于是在综合农业中心里不断爆发叛乱。由于艾达灵族对人类毫无同情之心，他们制定了计划，消灭、控制那些不守规矩的人，在夜间恐吓他们。到了最后，加努斯的农奴在异形的压迫之下屈服了。

languages.text: ムアランの秘密の支配は毒の果実をはらんでいた。農奴は自分たちが人類の敵の力により操られていると感じ、反乱が農業設備で繰り返し発生した。人類への思いやりに欠けるアエルダリが手に負えない者を支配、抹殺する計画を立てたことで、夜は彼らを恐怖させるようになった。ヤヌスは冷酷な占領の重荷に屈服したのだ。
languages.original_text: Muaran's secret rule bore poisonous fruit. Repeated rebellions broke out in the agri-complexes as the serfs felt they were being manipulated by a force hostile to Humanity. Devoid of sympathy for humans, the Aeldari developed a plan to control and eliminate the unruly, terrorising them in the night. Janus bent under the yoke of inhuman occupation.

traits.locale_text: ムアランの秘密の支配は毒の果実をはらんでいた。農奴は自分たちが人類の敵の力により操られていると感じ、反乱が農業設備で繰り返し発生した。人類への思いやりに欠けるアエルダリが手に負えない者を支配、抹殺する計画を立てたことで、夜は彼らを恐怖させるようになった。ヤヌスは冷酷な占領の重荷に屈服したのだ。

languages.text: Le règne secret de Muaran eut des effets néfastes. Des révoltes répétées éclatèrent dans les agri-complexes, car les serfs se sentaient manipulés par une force hostile envers l'humanité. Dépourvu de sympathie pour les humains, l'Aeldari ourdit un plan visant à contrôler et à éliminer les rebelles, en les terrorisant dans la nuit. Janus plia sous le joug de l'occupation non-humaine.
languages.original_text: Muaran's secret rule bore poisonous fruit. Repeated rebellions broke out in the agri-complexes as the serfs felt they were being manipulated by a force hostile to Humanity. Devoid of sympathy for humans, the Aeldari developed a plan to control and eliminate the unruly, terrorising them in the night. Janus bent under the yoke of inhuman occupation.

traits.locale_text: Le règne secret de Muaran eut des effets néfastes. Des révoltes répétées éclatèrent dans les agri-complexes, car les serfs se sentaient manipulés par une force hostile envers l'humanité. Dépourvu de sympathie pour les humains, l'Aeldari ourdit un plan visant à contrôler et à éliminer les rebelles, en les terrorisant dans la nuit. Janus plia sous le joug de l'occupation non-humaine.

languages.text: El gobierno secreto de Muaran produjo frutos envenenados. Se sucedieron las rebeliones en los complejos agrícolas, ya que los siervos se sentían manipulados por una fuerza hostil a la Humanidad. Sin la menor simpatía hacia los humanos, los Aeldari desarrollaron un plan para controlar y eliminar a los descontentos, acosándolos en mitad de la noche. Janus se doblegó bajo el yugo de la ocupación inhumana.
languages.original_text: Muaran's secret rule bore poisonous fruit. Repeated rebellions broke out in the agri-complexes as the serfs felt they were being manipulated by a force hostile to Humanity. Devoid of sympathy for humans, the Aeldari developed a plan to control and eliminate the unruly, terrorising them in the night. Janus bent under the yoke of inhuman occupation.

traits.locale_text: El gobierno secreto de Muaran produjo frutos envenenados. Se sucedieron las rebeliones en los complejos agrícolas, ya que los siervos se sentían manipulados por una fuerza hostil a la Humanidad. Sin la menor simpatía hacia los humanos, los Aeldari desarrollaron un plan para controlar y eliminar a los descontentos, acosándolos en mitad de la noche. Janus se doblegó bajo el yugo de la ocupación inhumana.

languages.text: Muarans geheime Regel brachte giftige Früchte hervor. Wiederholt brachen in dem Agri-Komplex Aufstände aus, weil die Sklaven dachten, sie würden von einer Macht manipuliert, die der Menschheit feindlich gesinnt war. Die Aeldari hatten keine Sympathie für die Menschen und entwickelten einen Plan, die Aufsässigen zu eliminieren, indem sie sie in der Nacht terrorisierten. Janus litt sehr unter dem Joch der nicht-menschlichen Besatzung.
languages.original_text: Muaran's secret rule bore poisonous fruit. Repeated rebellions broke out in the agri-complexes as the serfs felt they were being manipulated by a force hostile to Humanity. Devoid of sympathy for humans, the Aeldari developed a plan to control and eliminate the unruly, terrorising them in the night. Janus bent under the yoke of inhuman occupation.

traits.locale_text: Muarans geheime Regel brachte giftige Früchte hervor. Wiederholt brachen in dem Agri-Komplex Aufstände aus, weil die Sklaven dachten, sie würden von einer Macht manipuliert, die der Menschheit feindlich gesinnt war. Die Aeldari hatten keine Sympathie für die Menschen und entwickelten einen Plan, die Aufsässigen zu eliminieren, indem sie sie in der Nacht terrorisierten. Janus litt sehr unter dem Joch der nicht-menschlichen Besatzung.

languages.text: Muaran'ın gizli hükümdarlığı, zehirli meyveler verdi. İnsanlığa düşman güçlerce manipüle edildiklerini hissetmeye başlayan köleler, tarım komplekslerinde sürekli isyan eder oldu. İnsanlara karşı en ufak sempati beslemeyen Aeldariler, onları kontrol altında tutup itaat etmeyenleri ortadan kaldırmak için plan yaptı ve geceleyin onları avlamaya başladı. Böylece Janus, insan dışı istilacıların boyunduruğuna girmiş oldu.
languages.original_text: Muaran's secret rule bore poisonous fruit. Repeated rebellions broke out in the agri-complexes as the serfs felt they were being manipulated by a force hostile to Humanity. Devoid of sympathy for humans, the Aeldari developed a plan to control and eliminate the unruly, terrorising them in the night. Janus bent under the yoke of inhuman occupation.

traits.locale_text: Muaran'ın gizli hükümdarlığı, zehirli meyveler verdi. Köleler, İnsanlığa düşman güçler tarafından manipüle edildiklerini hissetmeye başladıkça, tarım komplekslerinde sürekli isyanlar baş gösteriyordu. İnsanlara karşı herhangi bir sempati beslemeyen Aeldariler, insanları kontrol altında tutmak ve itaatsiz olanları ortadan kaldırmak için bir plan yaptı ve onları geceleyin avlamaya başladı. Janus, insan dışı istilacıların boyunduruğuna girmiş oldu.
